roleset.note: GILD-V NOTES: Automatically created based on framefiles: festoon (9.8), tag (25.3). Edited by hwangd. Member of VNcls fill-9.8, illustrate-25.3. (from gild.01-v)

example.name: All args
example.text: Judge Roy Hofheinz has gilded the Houston Astrodome with $6 million worth of luxuries that have little to do with baseball.
example.arg: with $6 million worth of luxuries that have little to do with baseball

example.name: All args
example.text: She gilded the pagoda with gold leaves equal to her body weight.
example.arg: with gold leaves equal to her body weight
